Our seekers submit requests, and you can pitch directly to them.

After registering, you’ll notice the “opportunities” tab. This is where your gold is.

  • Here, you can pitch to them: how will you help them? How can you make a difference?
  • After you pitch, the client will be notified. It is up to them to select their specialist.
  • Once chosen, we realease contact details to each other - so you can get cracking!
